Audio.Locality: Poço Preto trail, Iguaçu NP, Parana state
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback from the second pair in forest edge by flooded area. Interesting that the two birds are giving distinct vocalizations (sexual repertoires?). The male bird had pale irides, the female had brown irides and a green back. Photo: link:http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/5486656790/
